description:
Across rear of 521 - 525 Holloway Road, N19 4BY
Clarion Housing Association Limited own 521, 523 and 527 Holloway Road
TG1 Mixed spp. group of mostly Prunus spp. (possibly Almond or Peach) with Vine, Bramble, Ivy, Sycamore and Elder of MWA Arboricultural Report (To the rear of 521-525 Holloway Road, N19 4BY) Works: Remove (fell) all within 7.0m of subject property to near ground level and treat stumps to inhibit regrowth. Reason: Clay shrinkage subsidence damage at neighbouring property 3 Wedmore Street, N19 4RU NOTES: A previous S211 notification for these works received No Objection (Notice included with this S211 notification) in March 2021 - the works were not completed within the 2 year period, hence this submission. A TPO application is being submitted regarding works to TG2 of the MWA Arboricultural Report.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
